faq.title: Everything You Need to Know
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most commonly asked questions about QR codes.
faq.pageSubtitle: Everything you need to know about creating and using QR codes.
faq.metaTitle: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions About QR Code Generator
faq.metaDescription: What is a QR code, how to create it, is it free? Answers to all your questions about our QR code generator.
faq.contactUsDesc: Our team is ready to help you. Contact us and we'll respond as soon as possible.
faq.a1: A QR code (Quick Response) is a two-dimensional barcode that can be read by smartphones and QR scanners. It can store URLs, text, contact information, WiFi passwords, and more.
faq.q2: Is it free to create QR codes?
faq.a2: Yes! Our basic QR code creation service is completely free. With the free plan, you can create 2 QR codes that are valid for 10 days. For more features, check out our Pro or Enterprise plans.
faq.a3: QR codes on the free plan are valid for 10 days. With Pro and Enterprise plans, your QR codes remain valid indefinitely. You can renew expired QR codes or upgrade your plan.
faq.q4: Can I customize my QR code?
faq.a4: Yes! You can change your QR code's colors, add your logo, choose different frame styles, and add text. Customization options are available on all plans.
faq.q5: What is a dynamic QR code?
faq.a5: Dynamic QR codes allow you to change the content anytime. You can update the destination URL or content without reprinting the QR code. This feature is available in Pro and Enterprise plans.
faq.q6: Can I track how many times my QR codes are scanned?
faq.a6: Yes! Our Pro and Enterprise plans include a detailed analytics dashboard. You can view scan counts, locations, device types, and time data.
faq.a7: You can download your QR codes in PNG and SVG formats. PNG is ideal for digital use, while SVG is perfect for print-quality output.
faq.q8: What should I do if my QR code isn't working?
faq.a8: If your QR code isn't working, check: 1) Is the URL typed correctly, 2) Is the QR code large and clear enough, 3) Is there sufficient color contrast (dark foreground, light background). If the problem persists, contact our support team.
faq.q9: What is a vCard QR code for?
faq.a9: A vCard QR code lets you create a digital business card. Your clients or business partners can scan the QR code to instantly save all your contact information to their phones. It can include name, phone, email, address, website, and more.
faq.q10: Can I create QR codes in bulk?
faq.a10: Yes, bulk QR code creation is available in our Enterprise plan. You can upload a CSV file to create hundreds of QR codes at once.
